channel.title: Making items stack able? I am using Delta
channel.description: How do I make items stack able I am using Delta.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2009, 05:56:36 pm[/size][hr]T clarify I mean like making Scimitars stack able.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2009, 06:04:49 pm[/size][hr]Please help!

item.title: Making items stack able? I am using Delta
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Item class,

while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; } dataIn.close();

Under the dataIn.close(); add:

			itemStackable[ITEMIDHERE] = true;

Read full topic
item.source: Making items stack able? I am using Delta
